channel.title: Need help getting client working
channel.description: hey all this may sound kinda stupid but this is my first time ever using PI. I downloaded a source and client today and the source runs fine but when i run the client is says cannot find path specified. I change it to my path and then i get a different error. Iv changed the code around many times but have not yet gotten it to work. Can someone plz help me get it running?
